name: The Mighty Grand Piton
description:
The Mighty Grand Piton is a short film about a young British girl, Connie, who travels to the Caribbean Island of Saint Lucia for her school holidays with her family. There, she accidentally awakens a giant robot buried under the Twin Piton mountains on the south of the Island.

(Source: Official Website)

name: MIRROR
description: The theme in this animation is doppelganger. This is story of one man and myself. Their memory, dream and hallucination are talked about in turn and their past and future go to gradually mix.

name: Euroboys

Music video with animation by AC-Bu.

Note: Won NHK's Digital Stadium Grand Prix in 2000.

aliases: Bonus Track: Atarashii Yoru no Hanami
description: Five short animations screened at the in-person venue "BONUS TRACK" located in Shimokitazawa, Tokyo with the theme of cherry blossoms.

aliases: Bonus Track: Atarashii Yoru no Hanabi
description: Four short animations screened at the in-person venue "BONUS TRACK" located in Shimokitazawa, Tokyo.

name: Long Zu
description:
Lu Mingfei never expected to live an extraordinary life. He was content with his average achievements and took pride in his skill in Starcraft. However, all that is upended when he suddenly receives a scholarship to study in Chicago at a place called Cassell College.
It all seems too good to be true, this can only be a scam! Little does he know, that when he does eventually accept the offer, it is but the beginning of the rest of his life, and the college's obscurity will be the least of his concerns once they start telling him about the dragons...

name: Yoru ni Natta Yuki noHanashi
description: One day, the snow metamorphosed into an earthworm, when it sensed danger for melting. The earthworm, who longed for aboveground, metamorphosed into a tree. It continues metamorphosing and... Someday, it will remember her old self.

name: Quails
description: Short animation by Mirai Mizue made with an iPad and McLaren's Workshop. Dedicated to Norman McLaren

name: The Dawn of Ape
description:
Here is the world’s first animation made to be watched by chimpanzees. Just for this once, we will show it to you humans.

This short film was first shown at JAPAN CUTS 2019 in New York City.

name: Atashi Dake wo Mite
description:
Having forgotten exciting feelings of the early days of the relationship, the man drifts along petting his guinea pig. One day he meets a beauty of flower who appreciates the pet.

Tomoki Misato's 2016 Graduation Work at Musashino Art University.

name: VAZZROCK THE ANIMATION
description: The anime will follow two units from the Vazzrock series—Vazzy and Rock Down.

name: Mamekichi Mameko NEET no Nichijou
description:
The story of Mamekichi Mameko NEET no Nichijou follows Mameko, a NEET ("Not in Education, Employment, or Training") young woman who lives with her dog Komachi and her three cats - Tabi, Simba, and Mero. "I'll do my best...starting tomorrow!" is Mameko's motto, and her daily life is a little bit normal, a little bit fun, and a little bit strange.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Shirayukihime to 7-nin no Kokeshi
description: A short animation with the theme of "7".

aliases: Metamorphous：Mountains and Streams／Ms.Yamakawa Keiko Never Looks Back
description: Man often yearns of a past more innocent and pure. This film disregards that sentimentality and depicts a constant, permanent transformation of the landscape of mountains and rivers. A beautiful and intense image poem made from thousands of pencil drawings.

Unveiling NoriPro's VTuber 3D animation NoriPro Anime!

Animation, voice acting, and scenario are all completely created from scratch!

name: My Demon Tyrant and Sweet Baby
aliases: My Demon Tyrant and Sweet Baby
description:
Prepare to LOL! Zhang Xiao, a food stall owner, is called mommy by the heiress to the Mu family, Mu Ya by accident. She accepts her father Mu Chen’s offer to be her nanny. With them living under the same roof, a fun and heart-warming journey begins.

(Source: iQIYI)

name: Ki-No-Ko
description:
Ki-No-Ko is a surreal five-minute short film published on Art of Silent Hill, Lost Memories: The Art and Music of Silent Hill and The Silent Hill Experience. The word "kinoko" is Japanese for "mushroom".

(Source: Silent Hill Wiki)

name: Fukuro
aliases: Bag, Sack, Art of Silent Hill
description:
Fukuro (Japanese for "bag" or "sack") is a 3-minute short film from 2001. It features Pyramid Head and a Lying Figure from Silent Hill 2, the Fukuro Lady, and many monsters from early sketches for Silent Hill 2. The film contains disturbing, surreal imagery. Credits go to Masahiro Ito (series art director) for creature design and to Akira Yamaoka (series composer) for the music.

It has been published on Art of Silent Hill, Lost Memories: The Art and Music of Silent Hill, and The Silent Hill Experience.

(Source: Silent Hill Wiki)

name: Shounen Sunday CM: Dan Doh!! Xi
aliases: Shounen Sunday CM: Dan Doh!! Xi
description: Dan Doh!! Xi television commercial for the Shounen Sunday magazine.

name: Shounen Sunday CM: Dan Doh!!
description: Dan Doh!! television commercial for the Shounen Sunday magazine.

name: Berserk: Ougon Jidai-hen - MEMORIAL EDITION
aliases: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition
description: A re-edited TV version of the Golden Age Arc film trilogy that took place from 2012 through 2013. It contains new scenes and music tracks and it is made in tribute to the late creator of Berserk, Kentaro Miura.

name: Ninja Bugei-chou Pilot Film
aliases: Manual of Ninja Martial Arts Pilot Film
description:
An animated pilot film for Ninja Bugei-chou released to the public over three decades later on Ninpuu Kamui Gaiden DVD volume 7.

The pilot film was created in 1969 as director Nagisa Ooshima was wanting to make a TV animation to build off his controversial film from 1967. The pilot was rejected by Shirato himself (the original comic creator the film was based on) and the plan was changed to animate Ninpuu Kamui Gaiden instead, a side story to the Kamui Den manga also created by Shirato. Though with this change, Ooshima did not partake in Ninpuu Kamui Gaiden's production.

(Source: MAL)

name: Aharen-san wa Hakarenai Mini
description: Chibi animations posted on the official Aharen-san wa Hakarenai Twitter account.

name: hololive Summer 2022
description:
Animated manga-style shorts created for hololive Summer 2022.

The crew heads to a tropical island to search for YAGOO after losing contact with him!
But there, they found a mysterious sunglasses-wearing trio!
What could they be after, and who is this Witch of Icy Smiles?

(Source: YouTube description)

name: Futsal Boys!!!!! Short Anime
aliases: フットサルボーイズ!!!!! オリジナルショートアニメ
description:
Short anime episodes included with the sixth volume of the Futsal Boys!!!!! Blu-ray/DVD. Each episode will focus on a different futsal team in the franchise, showcasing a snippet of the members' everyday lives.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love ST☆RISH Tours: Tabi no Hajimari
aliases: Utano Princesama Maji LOVE STARISH TOURS: The Journey Begins
Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love ST☆RISH Tours: Tabi no Hajimari
description:
TV anime special commemorating the series' 10th anniversary and the Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love ST☆RISH Tours film.

The boys of ST☆RISH have put in a lot of hard work for all their dedicated fans throughout the world. They deserve a reward before embarking on their next grand adventure!

(Source: HIDIVE)

name: Mirror in Mind
description:
A woman looks into her mind. Chasing her ideals on a tightrope. Every imperfect piece of her mind completes herself.

(Source: IMDb)

name: Sigh of Sighs
description:
A whale is being neglected and decayed since it has been drifted on the shore of Han River.
Such strange things happened but no one in the city cares, only a dog and birds are around the whale.
These sceneries are a remembrance of the depression which has been hanging over South Korea quite a while.

(Source: vcrworks.kr)

name: Insect Land
description: Anime based on "nature learning picture books" which explore the lives of insects, while also celebrating the themes of ecology and diversity.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo - PROLOGUE
aliases: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Prologue
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo - PROLOGUE
description:
The prologue of Mobile Suit Gundam the Witch from Mercury.

Note: Released in the summer of 2022 before the October broadcast of the TV anime series in the fall. Premiered for the first time at "GUNDAM NEXT FUTURE -LINK THE UNIVERSE-", an event that will take place across venues such as GUNDAM FACTORY YOKOHAMA and THE GUNDAM BASE Virtual World, and later on shown at other events all over the world, such as San Diego Comic-Con 2022.

(Source: GUNDAM.INFO, edited)

name: Pokemon Daiundoukai
description:
It's Pokémon Sports Day!
Watch Pokémon compete in various games such as foot races, ball-tossing, tug of war, and jump rope!
The accompaniment of a classical music medley makes the event more fun.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Turning Red
description: Mei Lee is a 13-year-old girl who is torn between being her mother's obedient daughter and the chaos of her youth. As if that were not enough, when she gets too excited, she turns into a big red panda.

name: Akiba Maid Sensou
description:
Spring 1999.

Admiring and wanting to be a cute maid, a young girl comes to Akihabara. The end-of-the-century "Akiba" is filled with a wide variety of maids. The maid cafe "Ton Tokoton," commonly known as "Butagoya" (Pig Hut), is open today as well!

I was in a panic because the new maid who had joined the store with me was quite unpredictable. Maids, trainers, and other Akihabara life forms appear as well, and the red bat swings into action!

This is a full-fledged maid's work struggle diary, given to all masters and ladies. "We are waiting for you to come home, boo."

(Source: MAL News)

name: Pokemon Omosakurabe Battle
description:
It's a Pokemon Mosawo Battle that compares the weight of Pokemon such as Pichu, Pikachu, Zeraora, and Greninja! I wonder which Pokemon will do it ...! ??

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Pikachu no Asa no Nikka
description:
Now, let's take a look at a morning of a Pikachu and find out what kind of routine it goes through.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: CoroCoro Monster Ball
description:
A rhythm video made for Pokémon Kids TV!
Check it out and see if your favorite Pokémon is inside one of the rolling Poké Balls!
The Poké Balls just keep on coming!
But just what types of Pokémon do they contain?

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Snickers x Shingeki no Kyojin
description: The campaign's concept is "Attack Celebrity" (or "Attack on Celebrity"), where the production team from the Attack on Titan anime series super imposes titan versions of Japanese celebrities into cuts from the anime series and changes the blades into Snickers bars.

name: Kaijuu ga Yattekuru
description: Animals at a zoo hear that a kaijuu is coming. Like a game of "Telephone" they hear bits and pieces of what the kaijuu looks like which gets distorted each time the information is passed on. In the end, it was just a normal zoo animal joining the exhibits.

name: Imagination of Marathon Runners
description: A comedic short film by Youji Kuri about runners.

name: Pokemon Inai Inai Baa!
description:
What's in store for us today?
Can you see the hiding Pokémon?
All will be revealed in the end!

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Kansatsu! Pokemon Zukan
description:
What kind of life do Pokemon have? Let's secretly try it!

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Pokemon Kids TV Douyou
description: A collection of assorted animated nursery rhymes and children songs released on Pokemon Kids TV Japan YouTube Channel.

name: Honekami
description:
A little girl reflects on her last summer with her father at his funeral.

Set on a small island in Japan where the director was born and raised, the film explores the relationship between the death of her father and the bomb storage in the mountain behind the family house.

(Source: IMDB)

name: Ikuta no Kita
description:
North is everywhere solitary. Here is all North. This is a record of the people I met in these Norths. However, my memory is fragmented and does not get the point at all. Now I'm starting to wonder my efforts came to nothing. I'm just getting the occasional recognition of the existence of the world through the dull pain changes shape little by little.

(Source: Official website)

name: Pokemon Moncolle Story
description:
The Pokémon Company has unveiled a new series of adorable stop motion videos to promote the ultra popular Pokémon Moncolle figures. Each video is brief and depicts a story consisting of events in which little versions of recognizable Pokémon take part in, featuring Pikachu, Poipole, Mimikyu, Rowlet, Zeraora, Buzzwole, Charizard, Litten, Popplio, Groudon, Garchomp, Rockruff, Rayquaza and more.

(Source: pokemonblog.com)

name: Primal
description: Set in an anachronistic and fantastical prehistoric-like world, the premise is a bond between a Neanderthal (Spear) and a Tyrannosaurus (Fang) who struggle to survive as they encounter the various dangerous fauna and people that live in their world.

name: Jungle Taxi
description: The taxi driver picks up an unwelcome fare in the jungle. He does as he's told and takes his customer to fetch the man close to death on the beach. Arrived at the destination, the cabbie reaches inside his jacket for a gun.

name: Cybervenus FeiFei
description: Short CG clips compiled to an artsy DVD experience. FeiFei is a "virtual idol", the clips are entirely computer generated, except for the longest story where FeiFei is placed in a natural environment.

name: Hokkyokuguma Suggoku Hima
description: A polar bear who is very bored with various marine animals in the deep blue sea. It continues an ancient tradition of "Caricatures of Frolicking animals" in scroll painting-style; this time, "Frolicking Sea Animals," in animation form, with a play on Japanese and English language word-plays: "Hokyoku-Guma Suggoku Hima. / Polar bear bears boredom", "Kawauso Kawaisou./Other otter, poor otter," etc.

name: Xingchen Bian: Po Tian Mi Ju
description: The fourth season of Xingchen Bian.

name: Obey Me! The Anime Season 2
description: The second season of Obey Me!.

name: Qi Jie Diyi Xian
aliases: The First Immortal of the Seven Realms
description: Because of a sudden kindness, Liang Xi has ten thousand years of true power, and joins Tianlingmen to embark on the official path of self-cultivation. Turning your hands into clouds and covering your hands into rain, while talking and laughing, the powerful enemies are wiped out. My wish is very simple. It is nothing more than planting flowers and raising grass, and making bubble girls and refining treasures. Covering the world with one hand, very good and powerful. Liang Xi looked at the sentient beings in the seven realms crawling under her feet, and emphasized that I am a man with a strong sense of chastity.

name: Digimon Ghost Game Recap
aliases: Digimon Ghost Game: Takenaka Naoto ga Kataru Kaiki no Sekai
description: Recap of the first 24 episodes of Digimon Ghost Game.

name: X-Men: Pryde of the X-Men
description:
Just as teenage mutant Kitty Pryde is welcomed to the X-Men, the team of mutant heroes are called into battle to prevent Magneto and his Brotherhood of Evil Mutants from crashing a comet into the Earth.

X-Men: Pryde of the X-Men is an animated television pilot originally broadcast in 1989 on the Marvel Action Universe television block, featuring Marvel Comics’ mutant superheroes the X-Men. The pilot aired infrequently in syndication, and was later released on video. It later served as the basis for Konami's X-Men arcade game. The animation for this pilot was done by Toei Animation.

(Sources: Wikipedia and IMDB)

name: Dahuoji Yu Gongzhu Qun
description:
Zhu Yun's university life just began, but it was disrupted by the arrival of the bad boy, Li Xun, who overturned her world. Li Xun, who appears like a wanton good-for-nothing, is actually a programming genius. However, the two of them gradually learn to appreciate each other's talent and knowledge after a few interactions. When senior Fang Zhi Jing tries to pick on Zhu Yun, Li Xun defends her and even invited her to join her programming team. Together, they won the championship of the programming competition. In the process, they fall in love and get together despite the differences in their family circumstances.

However, just when their business plan is about to succeed, a life-changing incident occurs. Fang Zhi Jing inadvertently causes Li Xun's sister to get into a car accident, causing Li Xun to hit him out of fury and was sentenced to jail. Zhu Yun refuses to give up on Li Xun, waiting for him to get out of jail and helping Li Xun defeat his business rivals and snatch back his company. Zhu Yun's relentless efforts touched Li Xun, giving him the courage to overcome the pain and open up his heart.

name: Jantama Pong☆ Episode 0
description: Episode 0 of Jantama Pong☆ that aired as an April Fool's joke.

name: Jantama Pong☆ Special
aliases: Jantama Pong☆ Web Gentei Tokubetsu Hanashi
Mahjong Soul Pon☆ WEB Only Special Episode
description:
Special web only episode that released before the Jongtama PONG☆ TV anime broadcast. The episode features VTubers Tsukasa Tenkai and Ito Life, and also mahjong player pro Takaharu Ooi.

(Source: AniList)

name: Xun Jian
description: The world says I am incompetent, but who knows that I am actually the greatest swordsman in the world? What does it matter to me if I am a son-in-law, let's see my sword sweep the world and break the sky!

name: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Zai Bie Tian Nan
aliases: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality

name: Jiu Tian Xuan Di Jue 2
aliases: The Success Of Empyrean Xuan Emperor
description: The second season of Jiu Tian Xuan Di Jue.

name: Shen Yin Wangzuo
description: While the demons were rising, mankind was about to become extinct. Six temples rose, and protected the last of mankind. A young boy joins the temple as a knight to save his mother. During his journey of wonders and mischief in the world of temples and demons, will he be able to ascend to become the strongest knight and inherit the throne?

name: Huang Yan
description: Yuxi who was discriminated against based on her looks goes to a plastic surgery clinic for a consultation, giving into the tempting proposal when Huantao, the handsome director, steps in and tells her, "I'll make you beautiful." Thinking that this was the shortcut to happiness, Yuxi accepts... but will she truly be able to obtain happiness by becoming beautiful?

name: Yoru wa Neko to Issho
description:
When Fuuta comes home tired at night, all he wants to do is spend time with his new cat. All the mysterious habits and mannerisms of house cats are carefully reproduced in this relaxed and cute comedy about living with an adorable furball!

(Source: Yen Press)

name: Gunma-chan
description: An anime series based on the Gunma prefecture mascot character, Gunma-chan.

name: RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM: Kouhen - Boku wa Kimi wo Aishiteru
aliases: RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM: Kouhen - Boku wa Kimi wo Aishiteru
劇場版 RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM
description: The second film in a duology compiling the Mawaru Penguindrum anime with new elements.

name: Zuihou de Zhaohuan Shi
aliases: Zui Hou De Zhao Huan Shi
description:
A talented young cook's encounter with a hungry girl who popped up in his kitchen changes his ordinary life forever. Dora, a summoned spirit and a truly cute goddess, now calls him master. However, he is not interested at all and trying everything he could to get away from the ghostly figure. As fate would have it, when he becomes a summoner by accident, there is no turn back in life.

(Source: MU)

name: Otsukare Oyasumi, Yumeko.
description: Animation by SUZUKI HARUKA, with music by Taeko Fukushima.

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen Recap
aliases: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen Recap
description: Recap episodes released before third season, summarizing first two seasons of Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen.

name: Blue Archive Anime PV
description: Animated promotional videos for the smartphone game Blue Archive.

name: Star Smash PV
description: Promotional Video for the Disney mobile game Star Smash

name: Closure no Kimitsu File
description: Animated shorts showing the daily life on Rhodes Island.

name: Orient Part 2
description:
The second cour of ORIENT.

The ferocious battle of Awaji Island begins now! With the appearance of the all-powerful Kishin, the land of Hinomoto is now dominated by oni, instead of humans. Musashi and Kanemaki Kojiro set out from their hometown swearing the form the strongest Bushi band of all time, and after encountering Hattori Tsugumi on their trip, the three of them found the Kanemaki Bushi. After obtaining the only weapons that can slay oni, Kitetsu Blades, they have taken the first big step towards their dream. In Harima, Musashi's group will encounter the massive band of Uesugui Bushi, and their leader Uesugi Tatsuomi. They have gathered to slay the giant Kishin that threatens to consume the Awaji island: Yamata no Orochi, the Artillery Wyrm. Joining them are Takeda Naotora and the Takeda Bushi, along with several Bushi the same age as Musashi like Shimazu Akihiro and Amako Katsumi. There's also the slightly sheltered, shy princess, Saruwatari Michiru. As different agendas swirl and interact, Musashi and his friends join the Kishin hunt. Yamata no Orochi is an unstoppable demon god that's never been scratched before. And so, the fiercest battle of all begins...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Obey Me!: Makai Dai Ryokou!
aliases: Obey Me! Special Anime: Devildom Family Trip!
description:
Demon brothers Lucifer, Mammon, Leviathan, Satan, Asmodeus, Beelzebub, and Belphegor are rarely in agreement. Being avatars of the seven deadly sins, their respective interests are strongly influenced by the sin that they embody the most. As a result, it is no easy task to decide on the itinerary for a family trip within the Devildom. What locations and activities would please everyone to make this getaway worthwhile?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

name: Maple Town no Shouboutai
description: A fire safety video starring the cast of Maple Town Monogatari.

name: Musabi Daibakuhatsu
description: A short film directed by Keiichirou Watanabe with the Eizou Kenkyuubu.

name: Tekken: Bloodline
description: "Power is everything." Jin Kazama learned the family self-defense arts, Kazama-Style Traditional Martial Arts, from his mother at an early age. Even so, he was powerless when a monstrous evil suddenly appeared, destroying everything dear to him, changing his life forever. Angry at himself for being unable to stop it, Jin vowed revenge and sought absolute power to exact it. His quest will lead to the ultimate battle on a global stage — The King of Iron Fist Tournament.

name: Rakka-sei
description:
An original concept movie directed by banishment (of FLAT STUDIO). This animation is accompanied with the songs “Slumber” and “Kaede” by Eve.

Kaede, a high school boy living in Tokyo, was plagued by the horror of a series of mysterious dreams. At that time, in the dream world where monsters roam, he meets another self. What is the secret of the spiritual world that gradually erodes everyday life and the emotions hidden within Kaede's unconsciousness?

(Source: Official Youtube, translated.)

name: Anata wo Hitokoto de Arawashite Kudasai: no Shitsumon ga Nigate da.
aliases: Anata wo Hitokoto de Arawashite Kudasai: no Shitsumon ga Nigate da.
"Please Describe Yourself in One Word": I'm Bad at the Question.
description: The anime depicts the "smart city" envisioned by Kyocera, where everyone can comfortably and safely live with the use of advanced technology, and it also depicts the worries of job seekers. The anime's title and theme reflect both the vexing issue of how to describe Kyocera's extensive business in just one word, and the mood of job seekers vexed by the interview question, "If you had to describe yourself in one word, what would it be?"

name: Rhythmens
description: An animated mini web series by Korean studio VCRWORKS

name: Cosmo Samurai 2
description: The sequel to Cosmo Samurai. A part of Toonami's Total Immersion Event (T.I.E.) for 2022.

name: C Danchi
description:
"Housing Complex C" centers around Kimi, who lives in a small, low-cost housing complex located in the seaside town of Kurosaki where trouble seems to follow her wherever she goes, and horrific incidents begin to occur. Is an ancient evil stalking the residents of Housing Complex C?

(Source: Variety)

name: D4DJ Double Mix
description:
D4DJ Double Mix is a self-contained special episode centering around the groups Merm4id and RONDO.

"D4 FES.", a DJ festival that has been described as legendary, was relaunched, and Merm4id's long-cherished wish to participate came true. Marika Mizushima, Saori Hidaka, and Dalia Matsuyama are concerned about the unusual behavior of Rika Seto during the swimsuit photo shoot. Meanwhile, RONDO's Tsubaki Aoyagi is alone in the chapel, indulging her hopes for the future how their world will be expanded.

One day, after a live concert at the clubhouse ALTER-EGO, Rika rushes into Tsubaki's place where she is with Nagisa Tsukimiyama, Hiiro Yano, and Aoi Miyake. She, who overcomes everything with luck and charm in order to enjoy life, makes a surprising proposal.

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

name: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls 10th Anniversary Celebration Animation
aliases: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls 10th Anniversary Celebration Animation
description: An animation commemorating the 10th anniversary of the THE IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls franchise. It was first unveiled during Day 2 of the "THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS 10th ANNIVERSARY M@GICAL WONDERLAND TOUR!!! Celebration Land" live concert, to preview an upcoming new story that will feature 190 idols coming in 2022.

name: One Piece: Mugiwara no Ichimi kara no Kansen Yobou Message
aliases: One Piece: Infection Prevention Message from the Straw Hat Pirates
One Piece: Mugiwara no Ichimi kara no Kansen Yobou Message
description:
The One Piece: Infection Prevention Message from the Straw Hat Pirates is a series of animated PSAs that were made by Toei Animation and aired on Fuji TV near the start of the COVID-19 pandemic in March 2020. Each PSA features a member of the Straw Hat Pirates giving viewers brief advice about keeping themselves and others safe from the COVID-19 virus. The Straw Hats are all voiced by their regular anime voice actors.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

name: Sekigahara Gassen: Kiro ni Tatta Tarui no Bushou-tachi
aliases: Sekigahara Gassen: Kiro ni Tatta Tarui no Bushou-tachi
The Battle of Sekigahara: The Warriors of Tarui Who Stood At the Crossroad
description:
The anime short depicts the feelings of two warlords, Takenaka Shigekado and Tamehiro Hiratsuka, who were both comrades in the service of the Toyotomi family but became enemies during the Battle of Sekigahara. The anime focuses on the relationship the two men had with the famous military strategist Takenaka Shigeharu, who served as the advisor for Toyotomi Hideyoshi.

(Source: ANN)

name: Yin Yang Shi: Ping An Wu Yu 3
description: The third season of Onmyouji: Heian Monogatari.

name: Mei Chuxi De Yinyangshi Yijia 3
description: The third season of Meichuxi De Yinyangshi Yijia.

name: BanG Dream! 5th Anniversary Animation: CiRCLE Thanks Party!
aliases: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! 5th Anniversary Animation -CiRCLE THANKS PARTY!-
BanG Dream! 5th Anniversary Animation: CiRCLE Thanks Party!
ガルパ5周年記念アニメ
description:
To celebrate the fifth anniversary of Bushiroad's mobile rhythm game BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!, a two-episode special anime will be aired and streamed simultaneously. The story of the special anime centers on "CiRCLE THANKS PARTY!", an event to thank the fans who have supported the bands since the days of the live house CiRCLE. The 35 girls scramble to prepare for the event, which will include food stands and live performances. And then, Kasumi and the others decide to perform a new song together at the live...

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

name: Wo Jia Da Shixiong Naozi You Keng: Tebie Pian
aliases: Wo Jia Da Shixiong Naozi You Keng: Specials
My Big Brother Has a Hole in His Head Special

name: Futoku no Guild
description: Kikuru Madan, is a monster hunter with excellent performance, because of his particular job in the forest, but he decided to quit it because of fear wasting his own youth...

name: Chao Shen Xueyuan
aliases: 啦啦啦德玛西亚 第四季

name: LaLaLa Demacia 3
aliases: La La La De Ma Xiya Third Season
La La La Demacia Third Season
description: LaLaLa Demacia  season 3

name: LaLaLa Demacia 2
aliases: La La La De Ma Xiya Second Season
La La La Demacia Second Season
description: Lalala Demacia Second Season

name: King of Fighters XV Special
description:
A trailer for the upcoming highly anticipated 2D fighter, The King of Fighters XV, showcasing a stellarly special animation by Masami Obari. This short movie depicts the playable cast in their respective elements and serves to hype up players for the game’s launch.

(Source: NoisyPixel)

name: Resourceful Princess
description:
"After rebirth, Mu Yunyao never did three things: be kind to others, leave a chance for evil, and believe in true feelings. She was sinister and reckless, who would rather turn the world upside down than stoop to compromise. However, there was always a cold-faced prince tailing her secretly, who wanted to marry and adore her… "

(Source: IQ)

name: The Legend of the Resourceful Princess
aliases: The Legend of the Resourceful Princess
description: Because of framed by her trusted friends, she was forced to jump off the cliff but did not die. When she opened her eyes again, she found that she had been reborn to a poor girl in ancient times. The girl was stunned by her father’s abuse, just because her father wanted her to marry Lord Nine who had a bad reputation, but she didn’t want to.

name: Coin Adventure
description: Graduation work of Huanzi Liu at Tama Art University.

name: Tata's Rainbow Brainstorm 2
description:
Tata's Rainbow Brainstorm 2 Tata loves to drink Coke, and has a lazy personality, but often has flashes of inspiration. Tata believes everyone has a sudden ego. In the real life, Tata’s brain is filled with visions and ideas, countless fantasies emerging suddenly, making every little thing in daily life more exciting! Lazy marmot, lazy you, shake it up happily together!

(Source: BiliBili)

name: Winter Memories: Honkai Impact 3rd Concept Animation
aliases: Winter Memories: Honkai Impact 3rd Concept Animation
description:
Snow and ice are the children of the north wind and the sprites of the moonlight.

In the last days of winter, let us cherish our holiday memories.

name: hololiveERROR
description: Horror series featuring members of the Vtuber group Hololive.

name: Boss, Let Me Go
description:
He, a powerful president, was schemed by the girl next door.She took advantage of him and left directly! How can there be such a good thing in the world? 'I'm sorry.' If it's useful, what else should the police do! Wherever she goes, she must be caught back! Suddenly one day, a little boy ran up to him, called him father and asked him to raise! What happened? Did that woman... Or did he fall for it again?

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Conspiracy of Love
description:
In order to reclaim everything that is rightfully hers from her uncle, she decided to approach her uncle’s biggest client—Sheng Jun. Initially thinking that everything would go according to her plan, little did she know that Sheng Jun is also carefully crafting his moves and already has her wrapped around his fingers. The two gets trapped in love but both are scared to express their honest feelings to each other, for one wrong step might lead to the point of no return.

(Source: IQ)

name: Bakemonogatari PV
aliases: 漫画 化物語 シャフト制作特別PV
description:
A promotional video coinciding with the release of the sixteenth Bakemonogatari manga volume.

Note: Initially shown off at the Ito Oogure's "Oh! Great Exhibition" in 2021.

name: Kiroi Kikyuu to Banno Sensei
description:
One day out of blue Prof. Banno of next class came to school with his hair shaven. Students made fun of his baldhead. Prof. Banno flew in a hot-air balloon the other day. Nobody knows anything about him afterwards.

1st year work 2014 by Yoko Yuki, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Hitoribocchi no Hero
description:
This is for children who couldn't be on their own. And, for the time when you're older and you've forgotten your determination to be on your own.

Graduate Work 2014, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Spoon
description:
A boy’s spoon falls on the floor when he is having a breakfast. The moment he is trying to pick it up, the boy is thrown into the different world. There he begins the adventure to take his spoon back.

1st year work 2014 by Yikun Wang, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Akaventure
description:
Mom and Dad imagine their little baby in Mom's tummy, which is just like a universe filled with amniotic fluid and the baby is having an adventure there.

1st year work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Konpeitou no Omajinai
description:
Marie has lost the precious memories of her mother and her magic spell. One day she meets a mysterious nutcracker in her dream and strays off into a extraordinary world.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Ushinawareta Sora no Shita de
description:
This story takes place in future earth, where people are restricted to go outside because of radioactive pollution. In the dark room, the boy is dying to play outside, and his elder sister is full of anxiety. "Gray" is one of the unit to measure radiation.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Shen Chu Kuang Hou
description:
A top killer from the 21st century accidentally became a loser empress through time travel, and got an extremely handsome husband and a cute genius baby. She gradually figured out that to dominate the imperial harem, she must hone her skills both at cooking and at pleasing the emperor. With her pot and spoon and assisted by a spirit chef system providing her with handy equipment any time, she finally swept the emperor off his feet, took hold of the harem, and reached the pinnacle of her life!

(Source: WebComics)

name: Centaurworld Season 2
description: Horse embarks on a mission to build an army and defeat the Nowhere King. It won't be easy, but she's got the herd by her side — and Rider back home.

name: Centaurworld
description: On a quest to reunite with her trusty rider, a fearless war horse journeys through a whimsical world filled with magic, adventure and singing centaurs.

name: Great Journey of Teenagers 2nd Season Part 2
aliases: Great Journey of Teenagers 2nd Season Part 2
Shao Nian Ge Xing 2nd Season Part 2
description: Part 2 of the second season of Shaonian Ge Xing.

name: Urban Immortal Emperor
description:
A generation of fairy King Jiang Feng returned and was reborn as a junior high school student. He wanted to return all the bullying, humiliation and regret he had received in his previous life. And he became stronger.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: My mystical husband
description:
Married for a few months, the husband silently pay but never show up, at the same time, Wilson
suddenly broke into her life. On one side is her husband, who is gentle and considerate but can’t be seen. On the other side is Wilson, who has been in love after a long term to get along with, What choice will she make?

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Bing Zhu Qi Hun
description:
When Li Shi was born, strange cosmic phenomena occurred and he became a vessel that held the soul fragment of the Master of Weapons. He was hunted by all the clans in the world because of it. Later, he decided to enter a clan to train and find the enemies who tried to kill him and his parents. He accidentally discovered Bai Xiang, a demon tribe formation master from the Hou Clan, who wanted to eat the various tribes of the Mountains and Seas. Ying Gou helped with the test of formation. A conspiracy was about to unfold in the city of Linhai.

(Source: Narul Donghua)

name: Estab-Life: Great Escape
description:
The distant future. After reaching its peak, Earth's population fell into decline. AI was developed to help preserve the species and manage the ecosystem; a grand experiment in human diversity. Through genetic engineering, a diverse array of peoples, including beastfolk, magical beings, and more, was created to live in a diverse city separated into walled "clusters".

Each cluster developed a unique culture, befitting of the people that lived there. Their lives, and the system, is continually maintained by the AI to ensure survival.

(Source: Polygon Pictures)

name: Fake Identity
description:
Lin Qinghan's grandfather is at stake, but regardless of the stability of the Lin Group, the relatives use all kinds of despicable ways to frame the female president Lin Qinghan and fight for the family property. However, the son-in-law, Zhang Xuan who is called Satan, the lord of the Dragon King Palace, solves the problem one by one.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Onipan!
description:
Three oni-kids who, through the power of the onipan (a portmanteau of "oni" and "pantsu") become human to help fix the relationship between humans and oni. The three girls transfer into a normal Tokyo high school to aid in their task and help fix their image by revitalizing the town, sometimes jumping headfirst into school events, and other times ... becoming idols!

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

name: Love Like Cherry Blossoms
description:
Lin Lu, an excellent student but shy and timid, secretly fell in love with the seniors, and accidentally met a boy named Xia Yi. They knew each other's secrets. In order to keep the secret, these two reached a consensus. Xia Yi began to help Lin Lu get the senior. However, who knows how it goes and where it goes.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: About you
description: Choi Seo-Yeon's graduation work from 2020 at Tama Art University.

name: Marry Me Again, Honey
description:
A tsundere man who don't know how to express his feelings to the one he loves for a whole life. Not only forcing her time by time but also being suspicious. The girl is so confused by his behaviors. However, till the end, she finally figures out his love. This is their love story.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: BASTARD‼ -Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy-
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world of heavy metal fantasy, the only thing able to save humans from orcs, lizardmen, and other monsters is something even MORE evil. Sealed within a 14-year-old boy, the chaotic wizard Dark Schneider is unleashed to fight four mighty generals and their plot to resurrect the evil god Anslasax!

(Source: Viz Media)

name: The Movie Queen's Revenge
description:
On the wedding day, what was waiting for her it was not happiness and goodness, but the sister's murder and the fiancé's unrequited love. When Chu Qi, who was pushed down from the top of the building, clearly saw the smile of her sister and fiance. Reborn to the world and returning to where the conspiracy has just begun, how can Chu Qi change her destiny?

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Kimetsu no Utage Tokubetsu-hen
aliases: Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Demon's Banquet Special Arc
Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Kimetsu no Utage Tokubetsu-hen
description: Specials for Kimetsu no Yaiba. They were originally shown at a live event in 2019 with the cast doing a live dubbing. They were later released on DVD / Blu-Ray in 2020 with a new dub.

name: Honey, Don't Run Away
description:
Jiang City famous business elite Ji Junyang was framed by the enemy and was blinded in a car accident. When he was on the verge of collapse, there was a young mysterious woman showed up. She helped him recover while he fell in love with her generally. But he didn't know the woman's name and called her "HONEY" On the first day of regaining the light, she suddenly disappeared, and Ji Junyang was angry and puzzled. He vowed to find her and ask her to come back.

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Revenge Master's Sweetheart
description:
He is a mute and paralysis who has been abandoned by family. She doesn't care about the ridicule of the world and has cooperated with him in a nominal marriage.
It was discovered after the marriage that he was a WOLF with goat's skin. 
Dare to say that he is a dog? That will pay the price!
He says: "Do you know what the dog's characteristics are? Be brave, loyal, and... always hungry!"

(Source: Official Youtube Video)

name: Ishi kara
description:
Four years ago while out for a walk in Ome, I picked up an intriguing stone of 30cm across. Then I wanted to pursue its image until its ultimate end.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Baby-Hamitang
description:
The episodes will present topics from the list of 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) such as global warming, food waste, and gender equality, in an easy-to-understand manner. Baby Hamitang will then solve the issues.

(Source: ANN)

name: Hana to Yome
description:
A bride runs in her full speed, with her veil flapping, and with steam. When you happen to encounter a bride in her wedding dress, you would love to bless her with a wave of your hand. Brides symbolize beauty and happiness. They are also athletes who won their happiness.

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: The Man Who Ate an Apple
aliases: The Man Who Ate an Apple
description:
An apple comes out of a man’s mouth. The man’s life goes backward, as video player is reversed. Many kinds of food accelerate to come out of his mouth and the man becomes younger and younger. Time goes back and goes back without end.

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: HARAPEKO MUSEUM
description:
There is a strange museum somewhere in the world. The museum is called HARAPEKO MUSEUM, or Hungry Museum. There are many kinds of colorful foods exhibited. At night they wake up in their frames and start to move freely. Welcome to the HARAPEKO MUSEUM!

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Xiao Motou Baolu La!
description:
In an attempt for survival, Yu Renjie, the son of the demon lord, was ordered to enter Hero's Academy which only recruits distinguished and upright disciples. The goal is to obtain a Hero's Certificate which can bring legitimacy to the demon clan. This is extremely dangerous. Once the identity of a demon cultist is exposed, countless righteous knights will kill them on the spot. But on the first day of school, Yu Renjie was shocked to find out that his personal information had been leaked. In order to hide his identity, he had no choice but to put on women's clothing. His dangerous and hilarious campus life is about to unfold!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

name: Wo De Yi Jie Zhi Lu
aliases: My Journey in an Alternate World
description:
Young Chen Xiaofan entered an alternate world after he accidentally swallowed a Chaos Orb, and became Young Master Chen, the prettiest man in Muyun City. Although he was adored by all the ladies in Muyun City, he was useless as he was not able to cultivate. With his mind set on going back to his original world, he gave up his stable lifestyle as a young master and went against his family's wishes, determined to walk the path of a cultivator.

(Source: bilibili Youtube)

name: Fragile
description: Hamaguchi Taigo's graduation work from 2020 at Tama Art University.

name: Kao Ni La! Zhanshen Xitong
aliases: I Might Be a Fake Cultivator
Wo Xiu Di Keneng Shi Jiaxian
description:
An Lin is a student in debt because of his father. While being sued by creditors, he accidentally falls off a roof. Fortunately, he is narrowly saved by a god. Touched by the sad life of the young man, the god offers him a system allowing him to have powers and convinces him to join the university of the kingdom of the gods in order to learn to practice martial arts and become immortal one day.

Nevertheless, An Lin soon realizes that the latter tricked him and gave him a poisoned gift.

(Source: Nautiljon, translated)

name: The surface of the earth
description:
Earth is the place and the established existence.

Earth is also a ball of dust, and a capricious object. At the avalanche of time-layer, falling deep down into the ground, you can see the fallacious landscape far from reality. The body recognizes the reality of the world by touching the landscape to regain the reality. It is an adventure between the real and the unreal.

Graduate Work 2012 from Sonomi Takada, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Teen Titans Go! See Space Jam!
aliases: Teen Titans Go! See Space Jam!
description:
he Teen Titans are visited by the Nerdlucks, the Space Jam villains who tried to capture Michael Jordan and the Looney Tunes. Astonished to discover his fellow Titans have never seen Space Jam, Cyborg organizes an exclusive watch party. Of course, if the Titans are watching a movie, don't expect silence to be golden. Raven and Starfire provide the commentary, Cyborg presents the fun facts, Beast Boy points out the butt shots, and Robin, but Robin doesn't trust their new alien friends. Are the Nerdlucks here to attend an innocent watch party, or do they have more sinister motives up their sleeves?

(Source: IMDB

name: Ukiyodoko
description:
The film is based on Ukiyodoko, a rakugo storytelling piece. Hanzo, the hero, brags to his friends to make a party go. Human nature remains unchanged once and now, as the time goes. We love meaningless conversations among boon companions. Different communication methods are visually tangled in the different times, Edo and today. The theme is an “interchange between the transient and the immutable.”

Graduate Work 2012 from Kazuya Karasawa, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Ninjala Cartoon Anime
description: Set in the year of 20XX, the series focuses on a group of 9 young rookie ninjas, called the Ninja Gum Kids, who are descendants of ninja clans who have mysteriously disappeared. The Ninja Gum Kids want to achieve one goal: to become master ninjas.

name: Petit Seka
description:
The "Project Sekai Anniversary Festa 2021" event announced on Sunday that production on a mini anime adaptation of Sega's Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku smartphone rhythm game has been green-lit. The 10 planned episodes of Petit Seka (Puchi Seka) will stream for free on YouTube.

(Source: AnimeNewsNetwork)

name: Feng Qi Luoyang Zhi Shen Ji Shaonian
description:
During the Wu Zhou period, Wu Zetian's imperial examination system severely hindered the interests of the traditional aristocrats. They were prepared to prevent Wu Zetian from ascending the throne. The protagonist Pei Kun came to the divine city Luoyang and was involved in the conspiracy of Chun Qiudao. Through a series of accidents, he tears apart this huge conspiracy.

(Source: Iqiyi)

name: Zo Zo Zo Zombie-kun (TV)
aliases: ゾゾゾ ゾンビーくん (2020)
description:
A gag comedy aimed at young children featuring Zombie-kun, a child zombie, and his interactions with the world. It's not intended to be scary in the slightest, but rather, it focuses on the comical and bizarre things Zombie-kun's body can do, and the common-sense-defying way Zombie-kun behaves. For example, he'll take out his stomach and inflate it with air to use as a pillow, or if he gets wet, he'll detach parts of his body and wring them out like towels, then reattach them with a glue stick. Everything is depicted in a cute, cartoony fashion so as not to be too graphic for kids.

(Source: Baka-Updates)

name: Tunshi Yongheng
description: Lin Chen was betrayed and his martial arts were crippled however, he had unexpectedly made a fateful encounter with the sacred engulfing star map, which led to the awakening of the Holy Vein constitution, and reaching the pinnacle of cultivation!

name: Where is my home?
description:
Here, everyone is an outlander. But something's not right. Everyone else has a place to sit at the table, a home to return to at will. Not him. Lonely as it may be, he will look ahead and find his place here.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Vlogs from the Bog
description: A series of shorts featuring Anne showing off the interesting things in Amphibia.

name: Amphibia Chibi Tiny Tales
description: Chibi Tiny Tales is a series of shorts produced by Disney Television Animation. It follows the surreal adventures of the characters from Amphibia in chibi format.

name: Wild Amphibia
description: In the style of nature documentaries, Soggy Joe introduces the viewer to a variety of strange creatures in Amphibia. After Soggy Joe is done reviewing each one, he will reveal a fictional promotion that is associated with him.

name: Amphibia Teen Girl in a Frog World
aliases: Amphibia Teen Girl in a Frog World
description: A series of shorts began airing depicting Anne encountering oddities in Amphibia with the Plantars. All of the shorts were directed by Drew Applegate

name: Shina
description:
Only separated heart grows big without knowing it. Eventually self swelled something almost swallowed himself to disappear. Chaff failed to make a good rice crop.

Graduate Work 2015 by Yagi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Hazamatsuri
description: Hazamatsuri is a student-produced independent animation about a festival on the threshold between the human world and the spirit world. It was directed by Yoshie Ezaki.

name: One Piece: Luffy Senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya!
aliases: One Piece Special Episode: Barto's Secret Room
One Piece: Luffy Senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya!
description:
Bartolomeo and Otama look back on Luffy and the Straw Hat Crew's adventures in the Land of Wano. Otama tells Bartolomeo about her meeting with Luffy, and the events leading up to the fierce battle with Kaido.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Saki Sanobashi Recreation
description:
This is a fan recreation of a supposedly lost anime. No such anime is known to exist and the only "proof" is an old online post detailing what they remember seeing.

Saki Sanobashi is a supposedly lost horror anime about the violent deaths of girls trapped in a bathroom.

name: Calicula Machine
description: A short film made for international festivals by Kinoshita Renzo in 1974~1976.

name: The Missing 8
description: A devastated world ── Androids and robots live there. "Poppy" is an android that looks like a human. Android "Punkun" who is not interested in human. One night, a star fell in front of them looking up at the sky ...

name: Yoshida Katsuko no Yabai wa! SDGs: Araburu! Trouble! Sustainable!
aliases: Yoshida Katsuko no Yabai wa! SDGs: Araburu! Trouble! Sustainable!
description:
The anime centers on Katsuko Yoshida, the cousin of Eagle Talon's Yoshida-kun, and an employee in Kemonomichi Electronics' "special general affairs" section. She educates her poorly informed colleagues about their misunderstandings of Sustainable Development Goals, the United Nations-backed goals for member nations to attain a sustainable future.

(Source: ANN)

name: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
aliases: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
Rise of the TMNT: The Movie
description:
When a mysterious stranger arrives from the future with a dire warning, Leo is forced to rise & lead his brothers, Raph, Donnie, & Mikey in a fight to save the world from a terrifying alien species… the Krang!

(Source: Turtlepedia.Fandom)

name: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
aliases: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description:
Deep down in the sewers of the hugely populated New York City, Raphael, Leonardo, Michelangelo, and Donatello are four mutant turtle brothers in their teenage years who go on new adventures where they end up "tapping into mystic ninja powers they never knew existed", while learning to work together as a team and navigate the perils of the modern age and hidden realms in order to fulfill their destiny to become a team of true heroes.

(Source: Turtlepedia.Fandom)

name: Helleborus Niger
description:
A story of a father and a daughter. He projects the images of former himself on his daughter. Their feelings start to merge as their memories clearer.

Graduate Work 2015 by Kohei Takeda, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Legends of Dawn: The Sacred Stone
description: Legends of Dawn: The Sacred Stone follows the story of Claude, an infamous thief, as he attempts to steal the Sacred Stone from the imperial capital. As the story unfolds, viewers are taken on a humorous journey featuring a cast of iconic heroes who attempt to stop him, while also discovering Claude’s true motives for wanting to steal the stone.

name: Nitian Xie Shen
description:
His meridians were destroyed. He was abandoned by his clan, mocked by the world as useless trash, and was murdered on the night of his wedding... but thanks to the Mirror of Samsara, his destiny was reversed and he was reborn into the world, filled with both hatred and regret. He swore that this time, he would reach the pinnacle of power!

(Source: Wutopia Comics)

name: Kasa
description:
In the world of constant black rain, people live under umbrellas’ protection. One day a man threw his umbrella away, which resulted to brought him a green plant, only existing green in that world. People desire his plant and start to scramble for it.

1st year work 2016 by Wenrui Huang, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Hana to Larva
description:
There's a pet caterpillar named Larva in my class. I don't like bugs but Larva is sweet and we become friends. But one day, I am faced with a horrible choice.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Shen Wu Tianzun 2
description: The second season of Shen Wu Tianzun.

name: Shen Wu Tianzun
description: I came from the void. With my hands, I can make the heavens fall and the netherworld crumble. I am a demon, a god, a deity, a human. I am Xiao Chen, the lord of all things.

name: Jiyuan Tai Qi Hao
aliases: チェリー・レイン7番地
description:
During the rise of the materialistic comfort of life in the 1960s, there emerges an undercurrent of danger in Hong Kong.

No.7 Cherry Lane tells the tale of Ziming, a Hong Kong University undergraduate, entangled between his amorous feelings for a self-exiled mother Mrs Yu from Taiwan in the White Terror period, and her beautiful daughter Meiling. He takes them to different movies and through a series of magical moments on the big screen, forbidden passions are revealed. And the era coincides with Hong Kong's turbulent times of 1967.

(Source: AniList)

name: Chu Lian Wei Tian
description: Do you still remember your first love? Maybe you have forgotten how you felt when you fell in love for the first time, maybe you have hidden it deep in your heart, or maybe you are enjoying your first love. Whatever, when you are in your first love, you may feel sweet, shy and happy. What story is going to happen when you meet your first love again?

name: Yami Shibai 10
description: The tenth season of Yami Shibai.

name: NIJIScenario
description: Visual novel shorts featuring Nijisanji's English vtubers.

name: Pocket Monsters: Kami to Yobareshi Arceus
aliases: Pokémon: Arceus, the One Called a God
Pocket Monsters: Kami to Yobareshi Arceus
Pocket Monsters (2019): Kami to Yobareshi Arceus
ポケットモンスター (2019) 神とよばれし アルセウス
description: Special episodes of the Pocket Monsters anime distributed exclusively on Amazon Prime to promote the release of Pokémon LEGENDS: Arceus.

name: Natsu e no Tunnel, Sayonara no Deguchi
aliases: The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodbye
Natsu e no Tunnel, Sayonara no Deguchi
description:
Tono Kaoru heard a rumor: The laws of space and time mean nothing to the Urashima Tunnel. If you find it, walk through and you’ll find your heart’s desire on the other side…in exchange for years of your own life. On the night Kaoru just so happens to find himself standing in front of a tunnel that looks suspiciously like the one the rumor describes, he finds himself thinking of Karen, the sister he lost in an accident five years ago. To Kaoru’s surprise, he’s been followed by the new transfer student Anzu Hanaki, who promises to help him experiment with the mysterious tunnel–but what does she want from Kaoru in exchange? And what will he have left to give, after the tunnel’s done with him?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

name: Suzume no Tojimari
description:
The story follows Suzume, a 17-year-old girl from a quiet Kyushu town who meets a young man looking for a door. They find a door within ruins in the mountain, and Suzume opens it. Soon, more doors begin to open around Japan, bringing disasters from the other side. The film depicts Suzume's liberation and growth, as she closes the doors that are causing disaster.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Canon T-70: Mirai Toshi-hen
description:
Four years before the cult classic anime 'Akira' was released, legendary artist Katsuhiro Otomo created two commercials for the debut of the Canon T-70.

(Source: Thirdculture)

name: Blue Reflection Ray Special
description: Recap of the first 12 episodes of Blue Reflection Ray.

name: Koukyuu no Karasu
description:
Deep within the inner palace lives a special consort who does not serve the emperor despite her position as a consort. She is known as the Raven Consort. People who has seen her say she looks like an old women, while others say she looks like a young girl. Stories talk of her use of mysterious arts, and how she can take on any request, be it death curses to finding lost things. Koushun, the current emperor, goes to visit the Raven Consort with that intention. Without knowing that their fated meeting will become a taboo that will overturn history.

(Source: Shikkarito)

name: Kanosora no kūsō
description: It’s summer vacation and all the kids in the neighborhood have left to visit relatives. But there in the relentless glare of the sun, is a boy looking up at the sky.

name: LB Commerce CM
description: An animated production showcase from LB Commerce.

name: QQQ
description:
Graduate Work 2012 from YungSung SONG, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

"Three Qs and more make QQQ. QQQ spin and roll. And QQQ transform themselves, spinning. QQQ transform, spinning, rolling, swinging, turning and traveling."

(Source: Geidai Animation

name: Bing Huo Mo Chu
aliases: The Magic Chef of Fire and Ice
description: Nian Bing is the son of a fire mage and an ice mage. After both of his parents were killed by the Ice Lord, Nian Bing received both of his parents' magic gems. When Nian Bing was trying to escape from the Ice Lord's followers, he managed to cast both fire and ice magic at the same time. An impossible feat for a mage. He fell from the cliff, unconscious, and was saved by an oldman. After he woke up, the oldman gave him a food so delicious he never tasted before. It turned out that the oldman was a genius chef, once called a spirit chef. And he wants Nian Bing to be his disciple no matter what! Is Nian Bing able to seek vengeance while aiming to become the greatest chef?

name: Shogi
description:
At a Shogi-chess game, the players start pondering opponent’s game strategy or calculations. They lose themselves in their deep contemplation.

1st year work 2016 by Moe Kuribara, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kenja no Okurimono
description:
This is a story about Jim, an apprentice magician, and Della, his wife, on Christmas Day. Della has her beautiful and long hair cut off and sells it in order to buy him a present that is a chain made for his gold watch. In the evening, Jim reaches home, but is stunned to see her look so different.

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Megaton-kyuu Musashi 2nd Season
description: The second season of Megaton-kyuu Musashi.

name: Yoru no Douro Kouji
description:
Nightly road constructions are completely forgotten in the morning. But they not only repair and maintain the streets, they heal scars and make them disappear without our knowing.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Irodorimidori
description:
Maigahara Music College Affiliate School Maigahara Senior High (abbreviated as MaiMai). At this academy that gathers the most promising musical talents, there's a rumor circulating among students. "If you give an amazing performance at the school festival, you get special extra credit (or so they say)." Serina's grades are not very good, so she immediately believes the rumor and decides to form a band!

Rehearsals, sleepovers... even cosplay? Everything they can imagine will become part of their colorful daily life. But will they really be able to give an amazing performance and get the rumored credit!? The curtain rises on the story of the daily, funny lives of these girls!

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: On Air Dekinai!
description:
The story takes place in 2014 and follows Mafuneko, a new hire at the "Tokyo Hajikko Television" company. The anime follows the hard struggles behind the scenes at making television content.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Yao Shen Ji 5
description: The fifth season of Yao Shen Ji.

name: Yan Wang: Guai Hualang
description: In an absurd world where your beauty rating dictates everything, who will be the one to break free of these shackles?

name: Zhan Shou Zhi Ren
description: In order to save the eternal winter kingdom, a resurrection squad called "The Blade of the Beast", with the heart of revenge, sneaked into the kingdom of Asa, the chief culprit who caused the eternal desperation of the eternal winter. At all costs, it was necessary to seize Restart the two keys of the world tree core...

name: Shoot! Goal to the Future
description:
Atsushi Kamiya, a former captain at Kakegawa High School and the world-renowned "courageous captain" for a famous Italian soccer team… And Hideto Tsuji, a student at Kakegawa High School, who seems uninterested in the now-weakened soccer team…

Their meeting is the start of a new legend...

(Source: Official Site)

name: One Piece Film: Red
description:
An almighty voice. With fiery red locks.

The story takes place on an island where Uta, the world’s favorite diva, performs for the first time in public. Uta’s singing voice, which she sings with while concealing her true identity, has been described as “otherworldly,” and while the venue is filled with the Straw Hats led by Luffy, pirates, navy, and fans from all over the world who have come to enjoy her voice, Uta’s voice is heard in a new light. The curtain rises on the story with the shocking revelation that she is “Shanks’ daughter!“

(Source: ONE PIECE FILM RED Official Site)

name: lemolemo
description: 2018 Graduation Work by Asami Tatsumoto, Graphic Design Department at Tama Art University.

name: Bai Yueer
description: The story takes place in a small town in China around 1930. In that turbulent age, Yueyue did not believe that his mother had left his reality. He remembered that his mother promised to come back for him, so he went on the way to find her.

name: Paripi Koumei
aliases: ขงเบ้งเจาะเวลามาปั้นดาว
description:
The Tokyo Party Scene isn’t NEAR ready for the star general of the Three Kingdoms era, but he sure is ready for it! Get down, shake your thing, and prepare to laugh out loud with this historical fantasy timeslip comedy, Ya Boy Kongming!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

name: Yurayura Ki
description: 2019 first-year graduation work by Asami Tatsumoto at Tama Art University.

name: Shiguang Zhaoxiangguan De Richang
aliases: The Daily Routine of Time Photo Studio
时光代理人 小剧场
description: Chibi-styled episodes of daily life at the photo studio.

name: JMAF23th
aliases: Japan Media Arts Festival: JMAF23th Movie
description: Animated introduction for Japan Media Arts Festival 2019.

name: moni moni morning
description: Graduation work of Asami Tatsumoto at Tama Art University.

name: Meiying Da Leyuan
description: On the sea far from the world, there is a beautiful and strange island. On this island, there is no division between righteousness and evil, and no thrilling battles. Inhabits on the island is a group of local people who sometimes help each other and sometimes make trouble, but everyone here has a legendary past. This is the peach blossom source of the second dimension world, where the Meiying family lives.

name: KILLING ME/KILLING YOU PV
description:
PV (Promotional Video) for KILLING ME / KILLING YOU, a manga serialized in Young Dragon Age, created by the manga writer Imomushi Narita.

(Source: A-L)

name: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Part 2 - Eris no Goblin Toubatsu
aliases: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Part 2 - Eris the Goblin Slayer
Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Part 2 - Eris no Goblin Toubatsu
Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Cour 2 Special
Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Part 2 Special
เกิดชาตินี้พี่ต้องเทพ OVA
Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Part 2 Special
description:
While Rudeus reunites with his father in Millishion, Eris sets out to fulfill her dream of slaying goblins. While at the Adventures' Guild, however, she encounters Cliff, a conceited young mage who threatens to spoil her adventure.

(Source: Funimation)

Note: An unaired special episode included in the 4th Blu-ray volume.

name: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Mo Dao Zheng Feng
aliases: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality 2

name: Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan: Super Extra
aliases: Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time: Super Extra
Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan: Super Extra
description: The second season of Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan.

name: Mori no Obake
description: Graduation work of Keiko Fujimi at Tama Art University.

name: BIRDIE WING -Golf Girls' Story-
description:
The story centers on two young women golfers named Eve and Aoi Amawashi. The two come from completely different backgrounds, and have the completely opposite play styles, and together they will shake the world of golf.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: SHINE POST
aliases: Shine Post Did You Know? The Most Ordinary, Natural, and Unique Magic to Make Me an Absolute Idol
シャインポスト　ねえ知ってた？私を絶対アイドルにするための、ごく普通で当たり前な、とびっきりの魔法
description:
The idol unit "TINGS" has big dreams, but only small achievements, and is not very popular. The best manager in the world was supposed to be their savior, but... "I'm not interested in being your manager." The man who shows up is Naose Hinaki, a man with no motivation. However, he has a special power...? This is a story of you and the girls shining brightly to become "absolute idols." The best idol entertainment begins here!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Ryman's Club
description:
The story centers on Mikoto Shiratori, a childhood prodigy at badminton, but who never recovered from a major loss during a high school competition. Now, he works in the sales department of the Sunlight Beverage company, playing badminton on the side.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Yoru kara Kita Hitotachi
description:
Graduate Work 2012 from Hiroko Satsuma, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

A sand man shows up in a child’s bedroom at night. He invites a dusty stuffed animal on the shelf to go out over the hill. The child follows them to get his animal back into the darkness of night.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Ano Natsu ni Futari de Ita
aliases: That summer there were two of us
Ano Natsu ni Futari de Ita
description:
Summer is coming to an end. A little girl on the beach remembers the days spent giggling and dancing with her friend. The goodbyes and memories intertwine in a mesh of sorrow and joy.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Pupa (2019)
description:
How long has it been since she lost control of her body? She is completely tapped out and finds herself wishing that she could just shed her body.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Sou Tennenshoku
description: 2019 Graduation work of Yutaro Sasaki at Tama Art University.

name: a friend in the memories
description: Graduation work of Yui Nomura at Tama Art University.

name: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2 Special
description: Unaired episode 13 included with the Blu-ray release of Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2.

name: Betsuni Daijoubudesu
description: Mizuinokima's Tama Art University 2018 graduate project

name: Gorilla Shinkaron
description: Graduation work of Naoki Kaneshin at Tama Art University.

name: Tokyo 24-ku
description:
An artificial island in Tokyo Bay—Kyokutou Houreigai Tokubetsu Chiku (Far East Special District), commonly known as the 24-ku (24th Ward). Childhood friends Ran, Kouki, and Shuuta, who were born and raised there, have different family backgrounds, hobbies, and personalities, but always hung out together. However, their relationship changes drastically in the wake of a certain incident.

At the first anniversary memorial of the incident, the three friends happen to meet again and their phones begin to ring simultaneously. The phone call is from a supposedly dead friend, urging them to "choose the future." The three will try to protect their beloved 24th Ward and the future of its people in their own ways.

(Source: MyAnimeList)

name: Oishinbo Pilot
description: The unaired pilot of Oishinbo, included with the first Blu-ray Box. It tells a similar story to that of episode two of the main series.

name: Yami Shibai: Furuido
description: Special Friday 13th episode of Yami Shibai 9.

name: Itsumo Issho
description:
Two sisters stay at home alone. They spend their time in their own worlds, at times in synch with each other and other times disconnected.

1st year work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Sorairo Utility
description:
Three high schoolers, Minami, Ayaka, and Haruka, head out for a sunny day of relaxation at the golf course. Beginner Minami slowly gains confidence on the grass as she learns and laughs with the help and encouragement of her more experienced senpai.

(Source: Funimation)

name: SHAREDOL (Pilot Film)
description:
SHAREDOL is a fusion of two ideas selected from about 15 proposals made by young producers from Toei Animation and Sotsu. The Toei team's proposal is about an ordinary young man of today who timeleaps into a world where Edo and the near future are fused together and creates his own destiny... and the Sotsu team's proposal is about an idol who travels back in time to the Edo period. As a result, a pilot film on the theme of "Edo" and "Idol" is produced.

The story is set in the Edo period, the Kansei era (1789-1800), a time when entertainment was strictly restricted. Based on the idea of "What if we used the knowledge of modern idols to produce Edo girls?" it depicts idol activities of girls living with their own problems. The pilot film includes scenes of the Edo girls' live performance in Japanese-style idol costumes.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Umeboshi Patrol
description:
A girl goes for a ramble in the neighborhood. The friendly dog is barking as usual. Oh, there goes a cat. Wait, no, it's just a shopping bag. The old guys are laughing about something. I know a lot about this town, and yet there's a lot that I don’t know.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Xian Yu Ge
description:
Xian Yu Ge is a salted fish who boarded at his aunt's house and hangs around idly all day long. However, due to his unique style of doing things, he often encounters survival crisis, and is always working around the island. During this process, Xian Yu Ge gradually becomes acquainted with the strange residents of the island, and he slowly gains family affection and friendship with them. With the arrival of the annual Fish God Festival, the hilarious daily story of Xian Yu Ge unfolds.

(Source: bilibili, translated)

name: Shu Ling Ji 2nd Season
description: The second season of Shu Ling Ji.

name: Little Bell and Ami’s Love Story
aliases: Little Bell and Ami’s Love Story

name: Shu Ling Ji
description:
In the boundary of Pazhou, there are hundreds of scholars, Tang poetry and Song poetry, all have Shuling 30,000 years ago, the gods named Nancheng Library descended from the sky, and the books in the Pazhou continent were born.

Shu Ling, "The Analects of Confucius", "Tang Poetry", "Song Song", "Compendium of Materia Medica", and perhaps "Three-Year Examination of Five-Year College Entrance Examination"; After 30,000 Years, Gu Qi must wake up from "Three hundred Tang Poems" Riding on "Shan Hai Jing", I decided to go to Miss Liaozhai, talk about how to levy (zheng) clothing (jiu) world – um, everyone is good, My name is Gu Qi, my emotional intelligence is low, my mind has Pit,I also like to say that I am very honest… But nothing, you can't beat me!

(Source: Kurina)

name: Wo Qi Ku Le Baiwan Xiulianzhe
Zhongguo Guaitan
description: Strange Tales of China discusses extremely frightening situations when mulled over carefully. What would happen if they were really to occur in real life? The mischievous imaginative Xiaozhi, born with a spiritual physique, possesses a strong sixth sense, high IQ and immense curiosity... but these are his greatest weaknesses as well. Each and every time, he finds some fancy new way to seek death thanks to his morbid curiosity.

name: Junk Head
description: Mankind can no longer reproduce because of gene manipulation aimed at making life longer. The clones ruling the bottomless underworld may have become fertile. Parton is selected to go on a mission through a subterranean labyrinth crawling with monsters to secure humanity's future.

name: Doushenji
description:
At the end of the 21st century, the discovery of a new energy source called "DG energy" (short for "divine grace energy") has revolutionized Earth's economy and allowed humanity to colonize space. However, when the initial expedition reaches Pluto, they are attacked by a mysterious, giant life-form known as "Nergal."

The Earth Alliance Army fights back by creating an "AG Unit" using ancient robot weapons known as the "G's Frame" which were excavated from archaeological sites all around the world. Girls with special qualities known as "Ancient Girls" can pilot these robots against the Nergal. However, the first AG Unit suffers heavy casualties in the Jupiter Trojan campaign, and the pilot of Unit 04, Minamiya Reiu, goes missing-in-action...

Years later, Minamiya Reika, the younger sister of Reiu, enlists with the AG Unit to search for her sister and to protect the Earth from the Nergal. A story of friendship, ancient robot weapons, and battles to the death with the Nergal ensues.

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

name: Shadowverse F (Flame)
description:
Shadowverse Flame features a new protagonist Light Tenryu and its story is set in Shadovar College, a facility that trains professional players of the Shadowverse game. Tenryu Light, a transfer student, decides to join "Seventh Flame," one of the seven Shadovar clubs. However, Seventh Flame is on the verge of closure due to a lack of members! In order to avoid the club's demise, Light decides to look for new members. But what awaits him are powerful rivals who control a wide variety of cards...

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

name: Lie Huo Jiao Chou
description: In the current era, a small percentage of people called "Special Abilities" have skills and powers normal humans do not possess. An autonomous organization, the Deviant Control Office, keeps these Special Abilities in check. Though some wish to maintain this order and peace, some wish to take advantage of their abilities and obtain more power in this world.

name: Look at Me!
description:
Graduate Work 2012 from Senri IIDA, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

A high-school girl came to an amusement park in the afternoon. She lost her bear key-holder when she changed key-holders. Misunderstanding to be abandoned, the bear tries to follow her. Can he really regain her love?

(Source: GEIDAI ANIMATION)

name: Houkago
description: A film by Kei Oyama about junior high students.

name: Mofumofuiction
description:
Fluffy turtles, fluffy monkeys, fluffy lizards. Discover the world populated by these mysteriously charming imaginary creatures. They have adorably fluffy bodies and are becoming an ever more common sight in daily life.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Nu'er De Richang 2nd Season Special
aliases: Growing Up With My Daughter 2nd Season Special
description: A Christmas Special

name: He Nu'er De Richang 3rd Season
aliases: Grow Up with My Daughter 3rd Season
He Nü'er De Richang Third Season
description: Third season of Grow up with my Daughter

name: Fei Ren Zai 5
description: The fifth season of Fei Ren Zai.

name: Tai Yi Xian Mo Lu: Ling Fei Ji 4
